Package powder

Class Particle

java.lang.Object
powder.Particle
Direct Known Subclasses:
Air, Granular, Solid, Tracer
public abstract class Particle extends Object
Particle This is the base particle class that represents a single pixel on the screen

    • testRel

      public boolean testRel​(int x, int y)
      Checks if a particle exists relative to this one and returns a boolean Takes regular Cartesian coordinates
      Parameters:
      x - Relative x position
      y - Relative y position
      Returns:
      boolean true if the particle exists else false

    • update

    • updateProperties

      public void updateProperties()
      Update Particle properties not directly related to position or velocity. This is a temporary container. We might eventually want to have properties that can actually change pos/vel.

    • supported

      public boolean supported()
      Finds if a particle is on the ground or on another grounded particle
